channel.title: CVE Feed for OSIsoft -- PI Vision
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OSIsoft -- PI Vision

item.title: CVE-2021-43553|2024-09-16T19:46:25.035Z -- osisoft -- pi%20vision
item.description: PI Vision could disclose information to a user with insufficient privileges for an AF attribute that is the child of another attribute and is configured as a Limits property.
